actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter XVIII, chapter 7, 42 U.S.C. to provide for the administrative and judicial review of claims (involving the amount of benefits payable) which arise under the supplementary medical insurance program.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to establish a system of administrative and judicial review of claims which arise under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter XVIII, chapter 7, 42 U.S.C. to provide for the administrative and judicial review of claims (involving the amount of benefits payable) which arise under the supplementary medical insurance program.
